subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Output:
•Strengthen the capacity of the OECS Secretariat to lead regional policy development and reform, and to provide technical advisory services and guidance to governments in key areas of social protection, social services delivery and inclusive growth policy formulation including agricultural sector and the sustainable rural development policy.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Social Sector Development
